translation.en: [man] What is it that haunts you?
translation.ja: お前を苦しめるのは何？

translation.en: Whose eyes peer at you from the dark?
translation.ja: 誰が暗闇から見つめる？

translation.en: [boy 1] I think he went this way.
-[boy 3] Come on. Over here. -[boy 2] We got him.
You belong out here with the animals.
translation.ja: ここで獣(けもの)と暮らせ

translation.en: [boy 1] We better not see you in town again.
Are you gonna run back to your mommy?
-[male victim] But they jumped me. -[woman] It doesn't matter.
translation.ja: ヤツらが先に 関係ない

translation.en: They started it. They've been picking on me for weeks.
translation.ja: ヤツらはいつも俺に因縁をつける

translation.en: You have much to learn, Jin Kazama.
translation.ja: もっと学ばなきゃね風間 仁(じん)

translation.en: [Jin] They say I don't belong there.
translation.ja: 〝英和辞典〞 “町に来るな”と言われる

translation.en: have you ever thought that it's because you don't belong?
translation.ja: あなたの居場所はそこじゃないからよ

translation.en: [sighs] Thanks, Mom. Way to make me feel better.
translation.ja: ひどいよ 母さんまた落ち込んだ

translation.en: Jin, those kids resent you because they're never gonna leave this place.
translation.ja: あの子たちはあなたがうらやましいの

translation.en: Yeah, they grow up here, they… they live here, and they die here,
translation.ja: 彼らは ここで生まれ育ちここで死ぬ

translation.en: while you… you're meant for more in this life.
translation.ja: でもあなたにはもっと大きな人生があると

translation.en: And deep down, they know that.
One day you'll leave this island, you'll travel, you'll see the world,
translation.ja: いずれあなたは島を出て世界を旅し

translation.en: and, I have no doubt, accomplish great things.
translation.ja: きっと立派なことを成し遂げるわ

translation.en: [mom sighs] You shouldn't have hurt them.
You've been training in the Kazama fighting style long enough to defend yourself without hurting them,
translation.ja: 危害を与えず身を守る技を風間流で習得したはず

translation.en: You lost a fight today, Jin.
[mom] You lost the fight with yourself, Jin. The battle against your anger.
translation.ja: 自分自身の怒りとの戦いに負けたの

translation.en: -I know you're better than that. -[gasps, exhales]
translation.ja: そんな人じゃないはず

translation.en: I know I've asked this before, but why did we move here?
translation.ja: なぜ俺たちここに引っ越したの？

translation.en: Never forget, Jin, the world is filled with both good and evil.
translation.ja: この世界には善も悪もたくさんある

translation.en: We moved here so I could make sure you experience good before anything else.
translation.ja: 何より先に“善”を知ってほしくてここに住んだ

translation.en: [exhales] How come we never really talk about my dad?
translation.ja: 父さんの話をなぜしない？

translation.en: [mom] Let's get back to your studies, young man.
translation.ja: ほら 勉強しなきゃ

translation.en: You pick, English or math lesson first.
translation.ja: 英語と数学どっちからやる？

translation.en: [Jin] Can't we just train or do some kicking drills or something?
translation.ja: 稽古かキック練習にしない？

translation.en: Oh, you've done enough fighting today.
translation.ja: 今日は十分戦ったでしょ
忘れないで　優れた頭脳が―

translation.en: Remember, dear, the first opponent you must defeat in any fight is yourself.
translation.ja: どんな戦いでも最初に倒す敵は自分自身よ

translation.en: If you're distracted, how are you gonna see the clear path to defeating someone else?
translation.ja: さもないと敵を倒す道筋が見えない

translation.en: Always focus on the immediate moment.
translation.ja: 今この瞬間に集中するの

translation.en: Not your day before, not the outcome you want later.
translation.ja: 過去や未来のことは考えなくていい

translation.en: The only thing that should exist is the technique, the form.
translation.ja: 考えるべきことは技とその型だけ

translation.en: When you have mastered the moment, then, and only then, can you start moving ahead.
translation.ja: この瞬間を制することなく前に進むことはできない

translation.en: Remember, you can counter any opponent's size and strength with surprise and technique.
translation.ja: 強く大きな相手でも不意を突く技で反撃できる
この技は“流雲墜(りゅううんつい)”
いいわ 上達してる

translation.en: [mom] Now, time to battle another opponent all fighters will eventually face.
translation.ja: さてと そろそろ究極の敵が来る頃ね

translation.en: [Jin] What did you eat when you were in Africa? Uh, did they have fish and rice? Stuff we eat?
translation.ja: 母さんはアフリカにいた頃どんな食事をしてた？

translation.en: It was different, but we had all kinds of great food on safari.
translation.ja: 動物保護活動のかたわらいろんな料理を楽しんだ

translation.en: I wish I could've brought the WWWC cooks back with me.
translation.ja: 保護団体の専属シェフがいたの

translation.en: -They were culinary ex-- [gasps] -[man] I wanna talk to that boy!
translation.ja: だから… 息子を出せ！

translation.en: I said I wanna talk to that boy.
translation.ja: おい そいつに話があるんだ

translation.en: Someone oughta teach that kid some respect!
-They always pick fights with me. -Remember what I said.
translation.ja: いつも絡んでくる 言ったでしょ

translation.en: I want you to apologize to the young man for hurting him.
translation.ja: ケガさせたこと謝りなさい

translation.en: We should take ownership of our actions.
translation.ja: 行動の責任を取らなきゃ

translation.en: Maybe you had a man in that house,
translation.ja: 父親がいりゃ いいのにな

translation.en: Boy… needs to learn… some manners.
translation.ja: 礼儀を教えてやらんとな

translation.en: Young man, take your father home.
translation.ja: お父さんを連れて帰って

translation.en: we should never take pleasure in the suffering of others.
translation.ja: 敗者をあざ笑ってはダメ

translation.en: I saw you smile when I disarmed and defeated Mr. Hirai.
translation.ja: あの人が倒された時笑ったでしょ

translation.en: The most important thing I can teach you
translation.ja: 私からの大切な教えよ

translation.en: is to control your anger and use whatever power you have for good.
translation.ja: 怒りを抑え善いことに才能を使いなさい
あなたには才能がある

translation.en: And it's important to me that you use that gift for good.
translation.ja: それを善いことに役立ててほしいの

translation.en: I just redirected his force and used his body weight against him. The rest was up to gravity.
translation.ja: 相手の力と体重を利用して重力に任せただけよ

translation.en: Jin, listen to me. Stay in the house.
translation.ja: 仁 あなたは家の中にいなさい

translation.en: You are not to come out, no matter what.
translation.ja: 何があろうと外に出てはダメ

translation.en: If anything happens to me, I want you to go find your grandfather,
translation.ja: 私の身に何かあったらあなたの祖父を捜しなさい

translation.en: Sometimes life calls for defense, sometimes for offense.
translation.ja: 人生には守りに徹する時と攻めるべき時がある

translation.en: Promise me you'll always know when to use which.
translation.ja: どんな時もそれを見極めると約束して

translation.en: -[Jin gasps] -[guard] Where do you think you're going?
He keeps trying to get into the building. This is the third time this week.
translation.ja: 何度も侵入を試みて今週は３回目です

translation.en: I'll, uh, handle it from here.
translation.ja: あとは こちらで対処する

translation.en: You've snuck into the wrong place, kid.
translation.ja: 坊やが来る所じゃない

translation.en: I'm trying to find my grandfather.
I doubt you're related to anyone in this building.
translation.ja: ここに君の身内はいない
祖父は三島 平八です

translation.en: [man] Uh… yes, sir. There have been incidents with an intruder trying to sneak into the building.
translation.ja: 本社ビルに繰り返し侵入を試みる者が

translation.en: All I see is a street rat that, thanks to you, has wandered in.
translation.ja: お前の不手際で入り込んだドブネズミにしか見えん

translation.en: I'm no rat, and I'm no child.
translation.ja: 俺はネズミなんかじゃない

translation.en: My mother sent me here to find you.

translation.ja: あなたが俺の祖父だと母に言われました

translation.en: Leave the boy here with me.
Do not make me repeat myself.
I didn't come here to fight you.
translation.ja: 戦いに来たんじゃない

translation.en: I was taught never to fight unless attacked.
translation.ja: “攻撃された時だけ戦え”と教わった
ほら 攻撃されたぞ
もう一度だ　攻撃しろ

translation.en: [Heihachi] If your name is indeed Kazama…
translation.ja: 本当に風間家の者なら
お前はその名を汚している
お前の相手など時間のムダ

translation.en: Before that green monster killed my mother,
translation.ja: 緑色の怪物に殺される前に母は

translation.en: she told me to find you.
translation.ja: あんたを捜せと言った

translation.en: She made me promise to find my grandfather, Heihachi Mishima.
translation.ja: 祖父 三島平八を見つけると約束したんだ

translation.en: It came for us, and it killed my mother.
translation.ja: そいつが現れ 母を殺した

translation.en: And with or without your help, I'll find it, and I'll kill it.
translation.ja: あんたの助けがなくても俺はヤツを見つけて殺す

translation.en: The creature that killed your mother is known as Ogre.
translation.ja: お前の母を殺したそいつは“オーガ”と呼ばれている

translation.en: -[Jin gasps] -[Heihachi] I will train you to fight him.
translation.ja: ワシがお前を鍛えてやる

translation.en: I will train you to defeat him.
translation.ja: ヤツと戦い 倒せるようにな

translation.en: In return, you will prove to me you're worthy of your ancestry,
translation.ja: 代わりにお前は その血筋に恥じないと証明しろ
命と引き換えにしてもな
